dt-option.name: searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria
dt-option.summary: Declares criteria and sub groups within the array

type.description: An array of objects which represent either a sub group or a criteria.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria` option is `[]` meaning that as standard there are no criteria or sub groups defined.
dt-option.description:
This is useful as it allows sub groups and criteria to be defined within the `-init searchBuilder.preDefined` option.
It is possible within this option to define both sub groups and criteria.
To add a sub group an object should be added that is in the same form as `-init searchBuilder.preDefined`. This in turn can hold its own criteria and sub groups. This means that it is possible to define sub groups to whatever depth that you desire.
To add a criteria an object with the following properties should be added.
* `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.condition` The condition that is to be selected from the select element. * `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.data` The data that is to be selected from the select element. * `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.criteria.value` The condition that is to be applied, be it to either a select element, input or date selector. * A type property in the same form as `-init searchBuilder.preDefined.type`.
